snippet: Marius Constant, who composed the theme to “The Twilight Zone,” had a place on a Riverside Symphony program with works by Bizet, Nielsen and Prokofiev.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by Riverside Symphony at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Marius Constant, who composed the theme to “The Twilight Zone,” had a place on a Riverside Symphony program with works by Bizet, Nielsen and Prokofiev.

headline.seo: Marius Constant Work on Riverside Symphony Program
